Articles.Content: So I was playing KSP last night and I was trying to dock FASAs CM to the LEM. Problem was it wouldn't dock. I have no idea what the problem is, anyone else know? Feedback would be appreciated ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
You have to have *very* low approach speed. Much lower than stock docking ports.

> 
> So I was playing KSP last night and I was trying to dock FASAs CM to the LEM. Problem was it wouldn't dock. I have no idea what the problem is, anyone else know? Feedback would be appreciated ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> You have to have *very* low approach speed. Much lower than stock docking ports.

Yeah, about .1 km/s is as fast as you want to go for the final approach for docking
.1 km/s is 100m/s, that would not end well. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
I meant relative speed! I actually didn't know what I was saying! oops! ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)
